html: If you plan on trick-or-treating tomorrow, try to go between 6-8 p.m. Don’t approach houses without their lights on. Costumes shouldn't obstruct a child’s vision, hearing or movement, and parents should examine all candy before the kids enjoy it. Have a safe and fun Halloween!

html: ATTN RESIDENTS: The City of Austin has issued a city-wide boil water notice. Do not drink water from sinks, water fountains or showers. You can shower, bathe and do laundry using the water. For more information, visit http://austintexas.gov/boilh2o  . Follow us here for updates.
text:
ATTN RESIDENTS: 

The City of Austin has issued a city-wide boil water notice. Do not drink water from sinks, water fountains or showers. You can shower, bathe and do laundry using the water. For more information, visit http://austintexas.gov/boilh2o  .

Follow us here for updates.

html: At a time when integration was considered ambitious and unachievable, baseball led the way by bringing together Americans from all different backgrounds – celebrating their love of the game.
text: At a time when integration was considered ambitious and unachievable, baseball led the way by bringing together Americans from all different backgrounds – celebrating their love of the game.

html: Baseball's impact on our country is best exemplified by Hall of Famer Jackie Robinson. In 1947, he changed this game forever when he stepped out on Ebbets Field to play for the Brooklyn Dodgers.
text: Baseball's impact on our country is best exemplified by Hall of Famer Jackie Robinson. In 1947, he changed this game forever when he stepped out on Ebbets Field to play for the Brooklyn Dodgers.

html: Baseball has always been America’s game. Growing up as a baseball player has shaped who I am as a person on and off the field – I know it takes hard work and perseverance to achieve anything worthwhile.
text: Baseball has always been America’s game. Growing up as a baseball player has shaped who I am as a person on and off the field – I know it takes hard work and perseverance to achieve anything worthwhile.
